landing.heroTitle: Easily create your professional ATS-friendly CV
landing.heroSubtitle: Create your resume in minutes and attract employers.
landing.atsInfo: ATS (Applicant Tracking System) is software used in recruitment processes. Employers automatically scan resumes through these systems. CVs that are incorrectly formatted or missing keywords will not pass. Therefore, applying with a <1>ATS-friendly CV</1> significantly increases your interview chances.

terms.title: 1. Parties
terms.content: These terms govern the relationship between the NextStepCV platform and its users. By accessing the platform, you are deemed to have read, understood, and accepted these terms.

terms.title: 2. Description of Services
terms.content: NextStepCV offers users a fast, stylish, and professional way to create resumes (CVs) online. Users can enter their personal details and either download a PDF or store their CVs on the platform.

terms.title: 3. Account Creation
terms.content: Users must create an account using their first name, last name, email address, and password. All information must be accurate and up to date. No one else should use the account without the owner's consent.

terms.title: 4. Usage Rules
list: Users must produce real, accurate, and legal content.
The platform must not be misused or harmful content shared.
Users must not endanger the safety of other users.
Content must not be illegal, offensive, or sexual in nature.

terms.title: 5. Service Continuity
terms.content: NextStepCV aims to provide uninterrupted service. However, temporary outages may occur due to maintenance, updates, or server issues. The platform is not liable for any losses during such times.

terms.title: 6. Content Ownership
terms.content: Resumes created on the platform belong to the respective users. The platform does not access or use private resumes without permission. By saving CVs on the platform, users consent to data processing.

terms.title: 7. Pricing
terms.content: The platform is currently free. In the future, premium features may be offered for a fee. Users will be notified in advance if any changes occur.

terms.title: 8. Third Party Services
terms.content: NextStepCV may use third-party service providers (e.g. hosting, analytics) to maintain the platform. These providers only have access to the necessary data.

terms.title: 9. Account Deletion
terms.content: Users may delete their account at any time. Once deleted, all data will be permanently removed from the system within 30 days. The platform reserves the right to suspend accounts without warning for severe violations.

terms.title: 10. Right to Modify
terms.content: NextStepCV reserves the right to update these terms at any time. Users are responsible for reviewing updates via the platform.

terms.title: 11. Contact
terms.content: For questions or complaints, you may reach us at support@nextstepcv.tech.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: At NextStepCV, we value user privacy. This document explains what data we collect about you, why we collect it, and how we process that data.

sections.title: 3. Purposes of Data Processing
list: To respond to your support requests

sections.title: 4. Data Retention Period
sections.content: Your data is retained while your account remains active. If you delete your account or remain inactive for a certain period, your data will be permanently deleted.

sections.title: 5. Security
sections.content: NextStepCV takes all necessary physical, technical, and administrative measures to protect your data. However, data transmission over the internet is not entirely secure; thus, absolute security cannot be guaranteed.

sections.title: 6. Sharing with Third Parties
sections.content: Your data is not sold to third parties for advertising. However, some service providers (e.g., hosting, image processing, analytics) may have limited access to your data for operational purposes and are bound by confidentiality obligations.

sections.title: 8. Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to manage sessions and improve user experience. These cookies do not contain personal information and are used only for anonymous analytics.

sections.title: 9. Legal Obligations
sections.content: We may share your data with official authorities if legally required. Otherwise, your data will not be disclosed to third parties.

sections.title: 10. Policy Changes
sections.content: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated to you via email.

sections.title: 11. Contact
sections.content: If you have any questions or requests about your privacy, please contact us at support@nextstepcv.tech.
